title: consolidating calendars in Calendar
creator: rgathercoal
content:
I have ended up with five different calendars. They all have different names--probably because I really don't understand how Thunderbird organizes things in regard to the rest of the internet. Several people in our household share calendars, to keep track of events, tasks due, and medications.

So how do I consolidate all the entries in all of these calendars? I have tried syncing, but that doesn't seem to work. How can I know that when I enter a soccer schedule on (one of) my calendars, it will end up on the calendar that my wife uses to print out our family weekly schedule?

title: Mail gets stuck sending
creator: mantissa
content: I started getting this problem about 6 months ago. I have used Thunderbird on Linux for years with very few problems until about 6 months ago. What happens is that when I send a message I get a dialog box saying sending and it will hang there for a long time, sometimes permanently. The size of message doesnt matter. Sometimes I can click on cancel and then retry and I am sometimes told it was sent but not saved. Sometimes it did not get sent at all. It is getting more and more annoying. It seems to happen after long periods of inactivity. Its not DNS, I have changed settings and DNS servers make no difference. I even went through and deleted lots of email and still it persists. I am running no extensions.

title: mail hameçonnage
creator: lalue
content: Bonjour, Ma femme, victime d'un hameçonnage, a effacé le mail frauduleux que réclame l'assurance Allyatys. J'ai pu récupéré tous les mails effacés ( plus de 800) en employant la méthode de X-Mozilla-Statuts: 0000. Mais bizarrement ce mail frauduleux manque à l'appel dans la période indiquée. Pouvez vous me dire qu'elles en seraient les raisons ? Par avance merci pour vos réponses. JL
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;os:Mac OS Sequoia;kb_visits_prior:["/fr/kb/profils-la-ou-thunderbird-conserve-donnees-utilisateur", "/fr/kb/importer-thunderbird"]
